title: Moroccan spiced lamb pilaf
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided', '680g boneless lamb stew meat, cut into 1.5cm strips', '1/2 teaspoon Mediterranean seasoning blend', '1 onion, chopped', '2 sticks celery, minced', '140g dry bulgur wheat', '350ml chicken stock', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '1 pinch ground allspice', '40g raisins', '40g flaked almonds']
